i can identify a trumpet creeper by looking at its delicate white flowers that grow in clusters and have a prominent trumpet-shaped upper petal.
blackberry lily: identify a blackberry lily by looking for a dark purple color on the upper petals and a lighter purple on the lower petals and a yellow center.
identify a blackberry lily by looking for its unique shape which is cupped and waxy, with a cluster of five or six flowers that resemble a blackberry in appearance and color.
